name: calendar-mcp-server
description: Google Calendar integration for scheduling, meeting management, and calendar operations
author: Calendar MCP Team

tools.name: calendar_create_event
tools.description: Create a new calendar event with attendees, location, and recurrence options

tools.name: calendar_update_event
tools.description: Update an existing calendar event's details

tools.name: calendar_get_event
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific calendar event

tools.name: calendar_list_events
tools.description: List calendar events within a date range with filtering options

tools.name: calendar_find_free_slots
tools.description: Find available time slots for scheduling meetings

tools.name: calendar_check_availability
tools.description: Check if attendees are available at a specific time

tools.name: calendar_schedule_meeting
tools.description: Intelligently schedule a meeting with optimal time selection

tools.name: calendar_reschedule_event
tools.description: Reschedule an existing event to a new time

tools.name: calendar_respond_to_invite
tools.description: Respond to a calendar invitation (accept, decline, tentative)

tools.name: calendar_create_recurring
tools.description: Create recurring calendar events with flexible patterns

tools.name: calendar_find_optimal_time
tools.description: Find the optimal meeting time considering all attendees' availability

tools.name: calendar_block_time
tools.description: Block time slots for focus work or unavailability

tools.name: calendar_sync_with_crm
tools.description: Synchronize calendar events with CRM activities and contacts
